snippet.title: Tailgate — An adventure with your tail out! Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
#adventure #cozygaming #gametrailer #indiegame 

Wishlist Tailgate on Steam
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3046820/Tailgate/

Join Tailgate Discord
👉 https://discord.gg/9DT8jsesXt

Become a dog and find your lost Human

One morning Hyde, a 9 years old labrador retriever, wakes up and realises that his Human, Derek, is gone. Hide reluctantly leaves his home to find him. 
He reluctantly leaves the house to investigate, only to find himself in the middle of an ancient dog prophecy. In order to find and save Derek he now has to uncover the mystery of the Tailgate. But he’s not going to face this alone — unlikely allies will come to help him as well as his superior dog senses and his sense of humour (albeit the doggo kind of humour).The game is planned to release in 2025 on Steam for PC. The first demo-version is coming soon.

Developer: Dmytro Yarynych

Twitter:  
https://x.com/dyarynych

Official site
https://tailgatethegame.com

#trailer #gametrailers #indiegame #cozygaming #gametrailer
